data.comment: Today's referee, Paul Tierney, has blown to start the match.
Southampton are pushing forward but Che Adams's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 2, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Southampton's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
The match at Emirates Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Bukayo Saka, who is down injured.
In the minute 6, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Southampton push forward at Emirates Stadium and Ryan Bertrand gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal defence.
Bukayo Saka for Arsenal is back on the field again.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Arsenal.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Southampton are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 15, In London Southampton drive forward through James Ward-Prowse. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Arsenal's Bukayo Saka gets in a shot on goal at Emirates Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 18, Theo Walcott scores to make it 0-1 at Emirates Stadium.
Che Adams instrumental with a fine assist.
Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Southampton.
Free kick for Southampton in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 22, Paul Tierney signals a Arsenal throw-in in Southampton's half.
Important block from the Southampton defence as Dani Ceballos fires in a strike for Arsenal.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
In the minute 25, Paul Tierney signals a throw-in for Southampton, close to Arsenal's area.
Jan Bednarek (Southampton) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal's Nicolas Pepe gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Southampton defender.
Dani Ceballos of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 28, Southampton have a goal kick.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Southampton territory.
In the minute 30, Paul Tierney awards the away team a throw-in.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Arsenal.
In the minute 33, Ryan Bertrand (Southampton) has received a yellow card from Paul Tierney.
In the minute 35, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Southampton at Emirates Stadium.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Southampton in London.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Arsenal.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nicolas Pepe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Arsenal.
In London, Stuart Armstrong of Southampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 44, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
Dani Ceballos for Arsenal has been booked by Paul Tierney and receives a first yellow card.
Theo Walcott for Southampton drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In London, Danny Ings (Southampton) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Throw-in for Southampton at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 45, Paul Tierney blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for Southampton in their own half.
In the minute 48, Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Southampton in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Southampton.
In the minute 51, Southampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Southampton at Emirates Stadium.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 52, Paul Tierney signals a Arsenal throw-in in Southampton's half.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Edward Nketiah.
In the minute 54, Arsenal drive forward but Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is judged offside.
Free kick Southampton.
Paul Tierney awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Southampton drives forward and Che Adams gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Southampton.
At Emirates Stadium, Gabriel Magalhaes has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 59, Southampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
Southampton's Stuart Armstrong gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Can Southampton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
In the minute 60, Southampton's Danny Ings is on target but unsuccessful.
Arsenal pushes forward through Bukayo Saka, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Southampton in the half of Arsenal.
Red card in London! Gabriel Magalhaes has been shown a second yellow card by Paul Tierney.
The away team have replaced Stuart Armstrong with Nathan Redmond. This is the first substitution made today by Ralph Hasenhuttl.
In the minute 63, Ralph Hasenhuttl is making the team's second substitution at Emirates Stadium with Moussa Djenepo replacing Theo Walcott.
Arsenal needs to be cautious. Southampton have an attacking throw-in.
David Luiz is replacing Edward Nketiah for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 66, James Ward-Prowse for Southampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 67, Southampton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a second substitution, with Joseph Willock replacing Dani Ceballos.
Paul Tierney awards the home team a throw-in.
Nathan Redmond (Southampton) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Southampton.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 73, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Important block from the Arsenal defence as Kyle Walker-Peters fires in a strike for Southampton.
James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 79, Southampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jannik Vestergaard (Southampton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Southampton have been awarded a corner by Paul Tierney.
In the minute 82, Paul Tierney blows against Southampton's Moussa Djenepo for offside.
In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Danny Ings (Southampton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, Arsenal are coming forward and Nicolas Pepe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Southampton have a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Nicolas Pepe with Cedric Soares. This is the third substitution made today by Mikel Arteta.
In the minute 87, Southampton's Nathan Redmond misses with an attempt on goal.
Paul Tierney awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Corner awarded to Southampton.
Paul Tierney signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Ball safe as Southampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Southampton.
Rob Holding (Arsenal) gets in a strike – but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Goal kick for Southampton at Emirates Stadium.
Throw-in for Southampton in the half of Arsenal.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Paul Tierney signals a Arsenal throw-in in Southampton's half.
